item.title: Press & Media
item.description: AWS Solutions Case Study January 2025 How Blue Origin Built the First AI Agent-Designed Hardware for the Moon in Days, Not Years BlueGPT platform featured in comprehensive AWS case study highlighting TEAREx development, 2,700+ agents deployed, and 70% company-wide adoption. Read Article Diginomica 2025 Boldly Rocketing into an Agentic Future Feature on Blue Origin's AI-powered lunar colony development, with BlueGPT accelerating hardware development by 75%.
